package.description: Purple KiCad theme. Forked from Dracula, it's dark. Try it out today!
package.description_full: Vampires can't stand light. I've also heard rumors that they love pink and purple. Put those two things together, and you get a dark purple theme with pink highlights! This project is a fork of the official Dracula theme, with added PCM support. The icon used in this package is a modified version of an icon that uses the CC-BY-3.0 license. That license can be found here: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/ The original work can be found here: https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/vampire-dracula.html
package.name: Vampire
